name: Heart Project
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------

Why is it called Heart Project anyway?

-----------------------------------------------------------

A catastrophic event has occurred over the surface, forcing everyone into the underground, forming cities known as Undercities.

Modules for these undercities keep people happy but some grow bored of being confined and venture out to the surface.

You are one of these people and its your turn to head to the surface!

-----------------------------------------------------------

With music from:

  • Akuma Kira
  • Nick Roeslein Oleksiak 
  • Andreas Rönnberg
  • Leyland Kirby
  • papey

-----------------------------------------------------------

A short 30~ minute adventure game with light puzzles and exploration, time to completion may vary.

It's more than what it seems!

A homage to games from the great:

  • Akuma Kira
  • Andreas Rönnberg
  • Keiichiro Toyama
  • Ivan Zanotti
  • and more..!

This is my first official Unity project, please don't mind some faults of the game.

If you wish to support the project, just share the game around! That's all I ask for.

Thank you for checking it out and please enjoy.
